trans-unit.source: Wraps an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> whose execution is initialized by an event.
trans-unit.target: 래핑하는 <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> 실행 되는 이벤트에 의해 초기화 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스는 상속 될 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] It is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity> that is used to handle an event; typically it can be raised from the host or by the runtime in response to a delay timer expiring.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]한 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>이벤트를 처리 하는 데 사용 되는; 수 발생 일반적으로 호스트에서 하거나 지연 타이머 만료로 인해 런타임에서.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>

trans-unit.source: EventDrivenActivity is inherited from <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity>; therefore, it is a sequence that has the additional restriction that the first activity should be an <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>.
trans-unit.target: EventDrivenActivity은 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity>따라서 그는 첫 번째 활동 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity> 되도록 하는 추가 제한이 있는 시퀀스에서</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> 상속 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The EventDrivenActivity is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, which means the EventDrivenActivity can contain other activities.
trans-unit.target: EventDrivenActivity가는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>는 EventDrivenActivity를 의미 하는 다른 활동을 포함할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>

trans-unit.source: The EventDrivenActivity is similar to the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> activity, with some additional characteristics.
trans-unit.target: EventDrivenActivity는 비슷합니다는 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity>몇 가지 추가 특성을 가진 활동입니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity>

trans-unit.source: An EventDrivenActivity must have a parent that is either a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ListenActivity>, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>, or <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.
trans-unit.target: EventDrivenActivity 하나 않는 부모 있어야는 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ListenActivity>, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity>, 또는 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ListenActivity>

trans-unit.source: The first child of an EventDrivenActivity activity must be an activity that inherits from <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>.
trans-unit.target: EventDrivenActivity 활동의 첫 번째 자식 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity> 에서 상속 되는 활동 이어야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: All subsequent children can be activities of any type.
trans-unit.target: 다른 모든 자식은 모든 형식의 활동 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity> blocks and waits for the pending occurrence of some events, such as starting a timer or the arrival of a message.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>차단 하 고 시작 하는 타이머 또는 메시지 도착 등 일부 이벤트에 대해 일치 하는 보류 중인 항목에 대 한 대기.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>

trans-unit.source: When the event occurs, the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity> finishes running and then all subsequent activities are executed.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트가 발생할 때의 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>끝나면 실행 되 고 모든 후속 활동이 실행 됩니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity> contains an EventDrivenActivity, the EventDrivenActivity has some restrictions: - The EventDrivenActivity may contain one, and only one, activity of type <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>.
trans-unit.target: 때는 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>EventDrivenActivity, 포함 된 EventDrivenActivity 몇 가지 제한 사항이:-The EventDrivenActivity <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.IEventActivity> 유형의 하나의 활동을 포함할 수 있습니다</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> must be the first child activity.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>첫 번째 자식 활동 이어야 합니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> cannot be in the event handler for a child activity and cannot be a child to the EventDrivenActivity if the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> is not the first child.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>수 없습니다 이벤트에 한 자식 활동에 대 한 처리기 및 경우에 EventDrivenActivity 하위를 사용할 수 없습니다는 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>첫 번째 자식 개체가 아닙니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>

trans-unit.source: - As long as the first activity is the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>, the event handler can contain any activities.
trans-unit.target: -으로 첫 번째 활동은는 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>, 이벤트 처리기는 모든 활동을 포함할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>

trans-unit.source: If an activity other than <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> is contained in EventDrivenActivity, that activity cannot have an event handler.
trans-unit.target: 이외의 활동이 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>EventDrivenActivity에 포함 된 활동 이벤트 처리기를 포함할 수 없습니다.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>

trans-unit.source: For example, an activity that supports event handling can be used inside the EventDrivenActivity but the activity cannot have event handlers attached to itself.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 이벤트 처리를 지원 되는 활동은 EventDrivenActivity 내부 사용할 수 있지만 활동 자체에 연결 된 이벤트 처리기를 사용할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Another example is that the EventDrivenActivity can contain a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup>, but the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup> itself cannot contain any <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> classes.
trans-unit.target: EventDrivenActivity 포함 될 수 있는 또 다른 예로는 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup>, 하지만 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup>자체를 사용할 수 없습니다 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity>클래스.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.HandleExternalEventActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity"></xref> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity"> </xref> 클래스 활동의 이름을 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The user-identified name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 활동의 사용자 식별 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the event activity that drives the change.
trans-unit.target: 변경을 구동 하는 이벤트 활동을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The event activity that drives the change.
trans-unit.target: 변경을 구동 하는 이벤트 활동입니다.
